metadata.title: CVE-2022-31741 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A crafted CMS message could have been processed incorrectly, leading to aninvalid memory read, and potentially further memory corruption. Thisvulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.10, Firefox < 101, and Firefox ESR <91.10.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
